name: Agravain
special_abilities: PLACE FACE DOWN AND SIDEWAYS UNDER AN OPPONENT'S FACE DOWN CARD.  IF IT IS UNDER A DRAGON, THAT DRAGON MAY NOT BE TURNED FACE DOWN AS LONG AS AGRAVAIN IS ON THE DRAGON.  DISCARD AGRAVAIN IF UNDER A TERRAIN CARD.
lore: A lesser Knight of the Roudn Table who did not like Lancelot.
